about_the_game:
Survive. Build. Connect.
Welcome to Nyric, where survival meets limitless AI-driven creativity. Use advanced AI to craft immersive 3D worlds, then explore a multiverse of player-made realms that’s constantly evolving. Every choice shapes your journey, leaving your mark on dreams and nightmares alike.

Build Your World
Start with nothing, build anything. From underwater cities to towering mushroom kingdoms to ancient battlefields, Nyric empowers you to create breathtaking environments in no time. And your world isn’t an island— connect with a vast network of player-made realms to explore, trade, and thrive together.

Your AI Companions Have Your Back
You’re never alone here. Loyal, sarcastic, and often outrageous, AI companions help you gather resources, overcome challenges, and tame the wild. Together, you’ll turn rugged frontiers into thriving cities, leaving a lasting legacy across the multiverse.

Team Up and Take On the Unknown.
Every realm in Nyric has a story to tell. Join forces with allies to conquer hostile environments, uncover hidden secrets, and push back the boundaries of the known. Bring your AI companions along for the ride and forge alliances with fellow players who share your vision.

The Multiverse Is Waiting
Nyric is alive, dynamic, and endless. It’s more than survival—it’s your chance to create, explore, and connect with pioneers from around the globe. Ready to leave your mark? Your adventure starts now.

name: Nyric

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 or GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or Intel Core i7-10700K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 XT or GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Start with nothing, build anything. From lush forests to eerie nightmares, Nyric gives you the power of advanced AI to craft breathtaking environments in no time. But your realm isn’t an island—connect to a network of player-made worlds to explore, build, and thrive together.
